main event: An observer reported seeing a luminous globe hovering in the sky in Sacramento, California on July 25, 1964.
interesting points: The object was described as very bright and hovered for several minutes before moving quickly,The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes,No details or dimensions were visible due to distance and brightness,The observer had never seen anything like it before,The conclusion was unable to identify the object.
witness description: One observer is a college student and the other is his brother who reported the situation.
